Tools Data Visualisation

These visualisations are based on data generated due to interaction with tools section of the platform. They are mainly based on three metrics for each tool- total number of days accessed, average number of students in a day and average time spent by a student in a day.

Total Number of Days Tool was Used in a School

  • Telangana
  • Rajasthan
  • Mizoram
  • Chhattisgarh
  • All Four States

Total Number of Students Enganged in a School

  • Telangana
  • Rajasthan
  • Mizoram
  • Chhattisgarh
  • All Four States

Number of Students per day Engaged with different Tools

  • Telangana
  • Rajasthan
  • Mizoram
  • Chhattisgarh
  • All Four States

Time Spent per day by Students on different Tools

  • Telangana
  • Rajasthan
  • Mizoram
  • Chhattisgarh
  • All Four States
